text: Kiya inn logon ko iss baat say tajjub hua kay hum ney inn mein say aik shaks kay pass wahee bhej di kay sab aadmiyon ko daraiye aur jo eman ley aaye unn ko yeh khushkhabri suniye kay inn kay rab kay pass inn ko poora ajar-o-martaba milay ga. Kafiron ney kaha yeh shaks to bila shuba sareeh jadoogar hai
